title: Winnie the Pooh the Great Honey Pot Robbery
brief_description: Three stories: “Pooh Oughta Be In Pictures” - Christopher Robin makes his own movie. “Trap as Trap Can” - Pooh and Piglet help Heffalump Jnr to learn about TNT. “Honey For a Bunny” - Rabbit trades with Pooh - but first he has to get honey - and escape bees. Rated: G
